info.title: Associations
info.x-hubspot-api-use-case: When an existing contact has moved to a new company, update their associated company to keep your CRM up to date.
info.x-hubspot-introduction: Use the associations API to create, retrieve, update, or delete associations between records, or between records and activities.

put.description: Set association labels between two records.

delete.description: deletes all associations between two records.

get.description: List all associations of an object by object type. Limit 500 per call.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

post.description: Requests a report of all objects in the portal which have a high usage of associations

Batch read associations for objects to specific object type. The 'after' field in a returned paging object  can be added alongside the 'id' to retrieve the next page of associations from that objectId. The 'link' field is deprecated and should be ignored. Note: The 'paging' field will only be present if there are more pages and absent otherwise.
Batch delete specific association labels for objects. Deleting an unlabeled association will also delete all labeled associations between those two objects

put.description: Create the default (most generic) association type between two object types

post.description: Create the default (most generic) association type between two object types

subCategory.description: A more specific error category within each main category.

context.description: Additional context-specific information related to the error.

links.description: URLs linking to documentation or resources associated with the error.

id.description: A unique ID for the error instance.

category.description: The main category of the error.

message.description: A human-readable string describing the error and possible remediation steps.

status.description: The HTTP status code associated with the error.

fromObjectTypeId.description: The type ID of the source object in the association.

toObjectId.description: The ID of the target object in the association.

toObjectTypeId.description: The type ID of the target object in the association.

fromObjectId.description: The ID of the source object in the association.

labels.description: An array of labels associated with the relationship between the objects.

subCategory.description: A specific category that contains more specific detail about the error

code.description: The status code associated with the error detail

in.description: The name of the field or parameter in which the error was found.

message.description: A human readable message describing the error along with remediation steps where appropriate

associationCategory.description: The category of the association, such as "HUBSPOT_DEFINED".

associationTypeId.description: The ID representing the specific type of association.

AssociationSpec_1.description: Defines the type, direction, and details of the relationship between two CRM objects.

link.description: A URL that can be used to retrieve the previous pages' results.
